Reference

cholera_as_fit()
Coerce an object into class `cholera_fit`
cholera_ceac()
Cost-effectiveness acceptability table from scenario simulations
cholera_compare_scenarios()
Compare scenario outcomes against a baseline
cholera_counterfactual_grid()
Build a counterfactual grid of AA-like scenarios
cholera_econ_defaults()
Load default economics parameters
cholera_fit_draws()
Extract posterior draws from a fit object
cholera_fit_metadata()
Extract fit metadata (packer, prior, start parameters, data)
cholera_fit_pmcmc()
Fit the cholera model to incidence data using pMCMC (monty + dust2)
cholera_fit_report()
Summarise fit diagnostics and posterior summaries
cholera_fit_select_iterations()
Select iterations from a posterior draws matrix
cholera_fit_trace()
Extract a long trace data frame from posterior draws
cholera_forecast_from_fit()
Forecast summary from a fitted posterior
cholera_forecast_scenarios_from_fit()
Forecast multiple scenarios from a fitted posterior
cholera_health_econ()
Health economic outputs from scenario simulations
cholera_make_aa_scenarios()
Build a standard set of anticipatory action scenarios
cholera_make_aa_scenarios_from_fit()
Create AA scenario set using a fitted posterior baseline
cholera_optimise_budget()
Optimise intervention allocation under a budget constraint
cholera_parameter_info()
Parameter metadata table for the cholera model
cholera_parameters()
Create a parameter list for the cholera model
cholera_parameters_print()
Print a parameter table
cholera_parameters_validate()
Validate a cholera parameter list
cholera_plot_ce_plane()
Plot a cost-effectiveness plane from scenario comparisons
cholera_plot_forecast()
Plot a forecast summary
cholera_plot_incidence()
Plot daily incidence summary for a variable
cholera_plot_ppc()
Posterior predictive check plot for observed cases
cholera_plot_scenario_forecasts()
Plot scenario forecast summaries
cholera_plot_scenarios()
Plot scenario comparison bars for a chosen metric
cholera_plot_trace()
Plot fit traces for selected parameters
cholera_plot_trajectories()
Plot trajectories of selected model variables
cholera_posterior_summary()
Posterior summary table for a fit
cholera_prepare_data()
Prepare and validate incidence data for model fitting
cholera_run_counterfactual_grid()
Run a counterfactual grid (convenience)
cholera_run_scenarios()
Run multiple scenarios
cholera_scenario()
Create a counterfactual scenario
cholera_scenario_report()
Produce a compact scenario analysis report object
cholera_scenario_summary()
Summarise scenario outcomes with uncertainty and baseline deltas
cholera_scenarios_from_grid()
Convert a counterfactual grid to scenario objects
cholera_simulate()
Simulate the cholera model
cholera_simulate_posterior()
Posterior predictive simulation
cholera_standard_scenarios()
Build standard operational scenario templates
cholera_trigger_time_from_sim()

cholera_update_from_fit()
